channel.title: Adding another Skill ID
channel.description: Fully added Dungeoneering. Got two quick questions. So when a player file writes, it goes skills to 1 - 24, how do I make it 1 - 25 (25 being dung) &, in the quest tab I'm adding.. - dungeoneering - Current Level: [LEVEL]/[LEVEL] What would I put in there to make it show the level. Would it be " + playerSkill[25] + "? Not quite sure on that. Would appreciate it! & another thing, how do I add another line saying "dungtokens" to where you receive Dung tokens? :/

item.title: Adding another Skill ID
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Fully added Dungeoneering. Got two quick questions.
So when a player file writes, it goes skills to 1 - 24, how do I make it 1 - 25 (25 being dung)
&, in the quest tab I’m adding…

  • dungeoneering -
    Current Level: [LEVEL]/[LEVEL]
    What would I put in there to make it show the level. Would it be " + playerSkill[25] + "? Not quite sure on that.
    Would appreciate it! & another thing, how do I add another line saying “dungtokens” to where you receive Dung tokens?

Read full topic
